attributes.action: promote voting by creating an "abstain" option at all elections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: creating the opportunity to abstain will increase the number of voters and give both government and citizens a greater understanding of the views of the public. many citizens do not vote because they have no confidence in any party so giving them the option to publicly abstain will let us know who is abstaining and who is apathetic. this is a democracy so let us let all voices be heard. its a simple change for an important cause. Gordon....vote democracy!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
